title: Allow localhost loopback capability in UWP apps deployed to the Microsoft Store
body: UWP apps currently are not able to access localhost on the same machine that the app is running on. This docs page describes the limitation: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/uwp/debug-test-perf/deploying-and-debugging-uwp-apps#debugging-options

comments.body: I am limited in architecting my components and solutions. A very basic but very important need is to have a common service component that will provide services to multiple apps running on the same machine but having different purposes.
Not being able to proxy to UWP apps limits interactivity between applications and innovation. Basically all web proxy applications have to be built on another platform at the moment because of this.
We need this capability to talk to drivers of non-UWP peripherals
I want to be able to proxy to my uwp app from my local machine.
